Alchemy.Description: The art of combining esoteric things together to make potions and poisons.

AlcoholTolerance.Description: This 'skill' represents your ability to ward off the adverse effects of alcohol. Note, however, that alcohol tolerance does not prevent you from becoming an alcoholic after prolonged alcohol abuse.
AlcoholTolerance.Name: Alcohol Tolerance

Anatomy.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of creatures in general. This is an umbrella skill that encompasses a vast suite of sub-skills for particular types of creatures. This skill represents generalized knowledge that applies to all creatures in the world.
Anatomy.Name: Anatomy

Anatomy_Aberrations.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of creatures made by mad science or dark chemistry.
Anatomy_Aberrations.Name: Aberration Anatomy

Anatomy_Arthropods.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of spiders, insects, and scorpions.
Anatomy_Arthropods.Name: Arthropod Anatomy

9.Notes: Butchery yields rare meat or organs: +3%

Butchery yields rare meat or organs: +3% (total 6%)
Butchery yields extra bones: +2% (total 6%)

50.Notes: More Combat Info Shown; Skinning yields a trophy skin: +1% (total 5%)

Anatomy_Bears.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of bears. Bugbears, which are half-goblin and half-bear, are also covered by this skill, as they take after their bear side more than the goblin side.
Anatomy_Bears.Name: Bear and Bugbear Anatomy

Anatomy_Canines.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of dogs, wolves, and werewolves. Gives bonuses to killing, skinning, and raising these creatures.
Anatomy_Canines.Name: Canine Anatomy

Anatomy_Cats.Name: Feline Anatomy

Anatomy_Constructs.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of constructs such as golems.
Anatomy_Constructs.Name: Construct Anatomy

Anatomy_Crones.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of crones and their ilk, including harpies, hags, and striga.
Anatomy_Crones.Name: Crone-Kin Anatomy

Anatomy_Demons.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of demons.
Anatomy_Demons.Name: Demon Anatomy

Anatomy_Dinosaurs.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of dinosaurs. This skill also covers birds, which are descended from dinosaurs, and dragons, which are descended from birds.
Anatomy_Dinosaurs.Name: Dinosaur Anatomy

Anatomy_Elementals.Name: Elemental Anatomy

Anatomy_Elves.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of elves.
Anatomy_Elves.Name: Elven Anatomy

Anatomy_Fey.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of faeries and fey creatures, including some animals that look mundane but aren't, such as the fey panther.
Anatomy_Fey.Name: Fae Anatomy

Anatomy_Fish.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of fish. Also snails. They're very similar. Really.
Anatomy_Fish.Name: Fish and Snail Anatomy

Anatomy_Fungoids.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of fungus people, slime monsters, overgrown bacteria, and ooze beasts.
Anatomy_Fungoids.Name: Fungoid Anatomy

Anatomy_Giants.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of giant-kin such as yetis and ogres.
Anatomy_Giants.Name: Giant Anatomy

Anatomy_Goblins.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of goblins.
Anatomy_Goblins.Name: Goblin Anatomy

Anatomy_Humans.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of humans.
Anatomy_Humans.Name: Human Anatomy

Anatomy_Incorporeal.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of incorporeal creatures, such as ghosts and shadow illusions.
Anatomy_Incorporeal.Name: Incorporeal Creature Anatomy

Anatomy_Orcs.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of orcs.
Anatomy_Orcs.Name: Orc Anatomy

Anatomy_Plants.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of monstrous plants.
Anatomy_Plants.Name: Plant Anatomy

Anatomy_Rakshasa.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of rakshasa.
Anatomy_Rakshasa.Name: Rakshasa Anatomy

Anatomy_Reptiles.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of snakes, snake-people, and generally snakey things.
Anatomy_Reptiles.Name: Reptile Anatomy

Anatomy_Ruminants.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of cud-chewing herbivores such as cows, sheep, deer, and camels.
Anatomy_Ruminants.Name: Ruminant Anatomy

Anatomy_Undead.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of undead, such as skeletons, zombies, and liches. This skill doesn't cover undead without bodies, such as ghosts and wraiths.
Anatomy_Undead.Name: Undead Anatomy

Anatomy_Ungulates.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of large herbivores that do NOT chew cud, such as pigs, rhinos, and horses. Also covers hippos, which are not ungulates, but which are close enough.
Anatomy_Ungulates.Name: Non-Ruminant Ungulate Anatomy

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Ancillary-Armor Augmentation, gain favor with Kohan or Ufkar in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Ancillary-Armor Augmentation, gain favor with Kohan or Ufkar in Rahu.

AncillaryArmorAugmentBrewing.Description: Knowledge of the techniques for creating Helm Augments and Shoes Augments. (Augments for other types of equipment are covered by other skills.)
AncillaryArmorAugmentBrewing.Name: Ancillary-Armor Augmentation

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Animal Handling, gain favor with Gisli in Serbule.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Animal Handling, gain favor with Gisli in Serbule.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Animal Handling, gain favor with Crelpin in the Fae Realm.

AnimalHandling.Description: The art of taming animals and teaching them to fight alongside you.
AnimalHandling.Name: Animal Handling

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Archery, gain favor with Alravesa the All-Hunter in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Archery, gain favor with Alravesa the All-Hunter in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Archery, gain favor with Floxie in the Fae Realm.

Archery.Description: Expertise with using bows to hunt and kill.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Armor Augmentation, gain favor with Kohan or Ufkar in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Armor Augmentation, gain favor with Kohan or Ufkar in Rahu.

ArmorAugmentBrewing.Description: Knowledge of the techniques for creating Chest-Armor Augments and Leg-Armor Augments. (Augments for other types of equipment are covered by other skills.)
ArmorAugmentBrewing.Name: Armor Augmentation

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Armor Patching, gain favor with Arlan in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Armor Patching, gain favor with Arlan in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Armor Patching, gain favor with Pegast in the Fae Realm.

ArmorPatching.Description: Skill in maintaining armor, including the use of repair kits to remove dents and holes.
ArmorPatching.Name: Armor Patching

ArtHistory.Description: Understanding of the rich history of art in Alharth. This skill can help you identify valuable artwork, but more importantly, it helps you to be a well-rounded individual.
ArtHistory.Name: Art History

Artistry.Description: Skill in the visual arts, including painting, sculpting, and mosaic creation.
Artistry.Name: Artistry

Assessment.Description: Skill in determining things about somebody based on their visible appearance. A high Assessment skill lets you see more information about other players when you examine them.
Assessment.Name: Assessment

Augmentation.Description: Skill in creating magical augments. This is an umbrella skill representing your overall knowledge of augmentation.
Augmentation.Name: Augmentation

Autodidacticism.Description: The ability to learn new skills on your own, just from reading a book.
Autodidacticism.Name: Autodidacticism

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Bard, gain favor with Percussa in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Bard, gain favor with Percussa in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Bard, gain favor with Raina in the Fae Realm.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Battle Chemistry, gain favor with Mox Warcut in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Battle Chemistry, gain favor with Mox Warcut in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Battle Chemistry, gain favor with Bendith the Banished in the Fae Realm.

BattleChemistry.Description: Using alchemical concoctions in the heat of battle. Not for the faint of heart, or the particularly sane, this combat style specializes in area-effects of all types. Advanced practitioners can also ingest their formulae directly to take on new combat personalities. Masters can even create homonculi to serve them in battle.
BattleChemistry.Name: Battle Chemistry

2.Notes: Access to new cross-discipline chemical concoction (in Mycology)

3.Notes: Access to new cross-discipline chemical concoction (in Fishing)

4.Notes: Access to new cross-discipline chemical concoction (in First Aid)

BeastSpeech.Description: Skill in speaking while in the form of an animal or monstrous beast. (You earn XP in Beast Speech by speaking aloud. You can't earn XP more than once per minute.)
BeastSpeech.Name: Beast Speech

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Blacksmithing, gain favor with Falkrin Overstrike in Amulna, or with Kodan in Sun Vale's "Animal Town."
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Blacksmithing, gain favor with Falkrin Overstrike in Amulna, or with Kodan in Sun Vale's "Animal Town."

Blacksmithing.Description: Making and enhancing metal equipment. Blacksmiths don't create armor directly, but they can buttress metal armor's effectiveness. They also create metal parts for many other skills.
Blacksmithing.Name: Blacksmithing

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Brewing, gain favor with Dhakmar in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Brewing, gain favor with Dhakmar in Rahu.

Brewing.Description: Skill in creating alcoholic beverages of all sorts.
Brewing.Name: Brewing

40.Notes: Can age an extra cask of wine or hard liquor (for a total of 3 at a time)

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Buckle Artistry, gain favor with Jake the Buckler in Sun Vale.

BuckleArtistry.Description: Skill in creating belt buckles with symbolic meanings. Belt buckle artwork is a deeply personal expression which can give hammer warriors a morale boost in battle. However, because they are so personal, crafted belt buckles are only useful to the person who crafts them.
BuckleArtistry.Name: Buckle Artistry

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Butchering, gain favor with Nishika or Rugen in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Butchering, gain favor with Nishika or Rugen in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Butchering, gain favor with Noita the Green in the Fae Realm.

Butchering.Description: Skill in the act of removing meat and useful body organs from a corpse. You need to be carrying a Butcher Knife in order to butcher a corpse. Corpses of sentient creatures, such as goblins and humans, can't be butchered.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Calligraphy, gain favor with Ufkar in Rahu.

Calligraphy.Description: The art of writing things. Handy for... writing things. It's also a valuable art for swordsmen and other warriors, who can infuse their art with potent additional effects.
Calligraphy.Name: Calligraphy

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Candle Making, gain favor with Gorvessa in Hogan's Keep, Eltibule.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Candle Making, gain favor with Bendith the Banished in the Fae Realm.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Candle Making, gain favor with Bendith the Banished in the Fae Realm.

CandleMaking.Description: Covers all the skills of the chandler, from rendering various materials into candle wax, to creating the candles themselves, including candles with exotic properties.
CandleMaking.Name: Candle Making

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Carpentry, gain favor with Amutasa in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Carpentry, gain favor with Amutasa in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Carpentry, gain favor with Solgribue in the Fae Realm.

Carpentry.Description: Preparing and treating lumber, and making things out of wood.
Carpentry.Name: Carpentry

Cartography.Description: Skill in accurately mapping your surroundings. You earn Cartography XP by clearing the 'fog' from game maps, which happens automatically as you walk around.
Cartography.Name: Cartography

ChargedPig.Description: This is a prototype skill that will never appear in the live game. (Charged Pig abilities can be found under the Pig skill. You can place both Pig and Charged Pig abilities on your Pig ability bar.)
ChargedPig.Name: Charged Pig

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Cheesemaking, gain favor with Braigon in Eltibule.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Cheesemaking, gain favor with Bendith the Banished in the Fae Realm.

Cheesemaking.Description: Making cheese, butter, and other dairy products. But mostly: cheese.
Cheesemaking.Name: Cheesemaking

40.Notes: Can age an extra cask of cheese (for a total of 3 at a time)

CivicPride.Description: Represents your willingness to tackle the small, mundane tasks in your community, and your understanding of why that's important. This skill is especially valued by humans.
CivicPride.Name: Civic Pride

Compassion.Description: The ability to feel empathy, even for creatures not at all like yourself.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Cooking, gain favor with Selaxi in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Cooking, gain favor with Floxie in the Fae Realm.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Cooking, gain favor with Floxie in the Fae Realm.

Cooking.Description: Skill in preparing food for consumption.

CorpseTalking.Description: Ability to commune telepathically with nearby dead bodies. Higher skill grants higher chances of persuading recalcitrant spirits, as well as higher comprehension rates when learning from the dead.
CorpseTalking.Name: Corpse Talking

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Cow, gain favor with Raul in Sun Vale's "Animal Town."
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Cow, gain favor with Raul in Sun Vale's "Animal Town."
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Cow, gain favor with Noita the Green in the Fae Realm.

Cow.Description: The art of living and fighting as a cow.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Crossbow, gain favor with Bellema Deftwhisper in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Crossbow, gain favor with Floxie in the Fae Realm.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Crossbow, gain favor with Floxie in the Fae Realm.

Crossbow.Description: Knowledge of crossbows, including how to fire and reload them, as well as how to maintain them in peak condition.
Crossbow.Name: Crossbow

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Deer, gain favor with Jumper in Sun Vale's "Animal Town."
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Deer, gain favor with Jumper in Sun Vale's "Animal Town."
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Deer, gain favor with Noita the Green in the Fae Realm.

Deer.Description: The art of living and fighting as a deer.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Druid, gain favor with Lady Windsong in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Druid, gain favor with Lady Windsong in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Druid, gain favor with Raina in the Fae Realm.

DyeMaking.Description:
Skill in producing dye. These dyes can be used to color armor.

This skill covers only the creation of the dye; Textile Creation, Tanning, or Blacksmithing is used to apply the dye, depending on what the armor is made of.
DyeMaking.Name: Dye Making

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Endurance, gain favor with Lamashu in Kur Mountains.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Endurance, gain favor with Lamashu in Kur Mountains.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Endurance, gain favor with Backfat in the Fae Realm.

Endurance.Description:
The ability to endure heavy loads and uncomfortable situations without getting tired. Your Endurance increases the speed of your armor regeneration between fights, among other things.

(The most common way to raise Endurance is simply to take armor damage in combat.)
Endurance.Name: Endurance

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Fairy Magic, gain favor with Preta in Sun Vale.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Fairy Magic, gain favor with Preta in Sun Vale.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Fairy Magic, gain favor with Raina in the Fae Realm.

FairyMagic.Description: A sub-skill of Mentalism that focuses on psychic links to the fae realms.
FairyMagic.Name: Fairy Magic

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Fire Magic, gain favor with The Sand Seer in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Fire Magic, gain favor with The Sand Seer in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Fire Magic, gain favor with Bendith the Banished in the Fae Realm.

FireMagic.Description: Using Fire to destroy your enemies. This is a very potent offensive skill, including long-range and area-effect attacks, and even some Cold attacks for versatility. However, there are drawbacks: Fire Magic is extremely Power-intensive; all creatures generate extra Rage when they are burned; and many creatures have some resistance to fire.
FireMagic.Name: Fire Magic

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in First Aid, gain favor with Mox Warcut in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in First Aid, gain favor with Mox Warcut in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in First Aid, gain favor with Backfat in the Fae Realm.

FirstAid.Description: The ability to use first aid kits to heal yourself or others.
FirstAid.Name: First Aid

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Fishing, gain favor with Rugen in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Fishing, gain favor with Rugen in Rahu.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Fletching, gain favor with Bellema Deftwhisper in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Fletching, gain favor with Floxie in the Fae Realm.

Fletching.Description: The craft of arrow-making. Most fletching recipes require elements obtained from Carpentry, so it's often handy to know both skills well. At higher level, fletchers also need various Alchemy components.

10.Notes: Can now maintain two Fletching Boxes at once

20.Notes: Can now maintain three Fletching Boxes at once

30.Notes: Can now maintain four Fletching Boxes at once

40.Notes: Can now maintain five Fletching Boxes at once

50.Notes: Can now maintain six Fletching Boxes at once

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Flower Arrangement, gain favor with Rohina in Sun Vale.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Flower Arrangement, gain favor with Floxie in the Fae Realm.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Flower Arrangement, gain favor with Floxie in the Fae Realm.

FlowerArrangement.Description: The art of arranging flowers so that they evoke strong emotions.
FlowerArrangement.Name: Flower Arrangement

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Foraging, gain favor with Jesina the Fairy in Eltibule.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Foraging, gain favor with Jesina the Fairy in Eltibule.

Foraging.Description: The art of picking things up. Except mushrooms, those are special for some reason. Experts at Foraging are also experts at tracking down stationary items and locations (such as many Quest Objectives).

Gadgeteering.Description: The ability to create elaborate contraptions that automate complex tasks.
Gadgeteering.Name: Gadgeteering

Gaming.Description: Skill in playing games, especially gambling games.
Gaming.Name: Gaming

15.Notes: Ability to tip Game Masters (Monsters and Mantids)

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Gardening, gain favor with Kelim in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Gardening, gain favor with Kelim in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Gardening, gain favor with Floxie in the Fae Realm.

Gardening.Description: Growing things in a garden: herbs, food, and flowers.

GenderStudies.Description: A careful exploration of gender roles and sexuality, focusing on Human, Elven, and Rakshasa cultures. This knowledge is not directly applicable to combat or crafting, but it helps you to be a well-rounded individual.
GenderStudies.Name: Gender Studies

Genetics.Description: Knowledge of the genetics of creatures in general. This is an umbrella skill that encompasses a vast suite of sub-skills for particular types of creatures. This skill represents generalized genetics knowledge.
Genetics.Name: Genetics

Genetics_Arthropods.Description: Knowledge of the genetics of spiders, insects, and scorpions.
Genetics_Arthropods.Name: Arthropod Genetics

Genetics_Cats.Description: Knowledge of the genetics of cats of all types.
Genetics_Cats.Name: Cat Genetics

Genetics_Ruminants.Description: Knowledge of the genetics of cud-chewing herbivores such as cows, sheep, deer, and camels.
Genetics_Ruminants.Name: Ruminant Genetics

Geology.Description: Digging crystals out of the ground, and knowing what they do.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Giant Bat, gain favor with Yavazek in Sun Vale's Animal Town.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Giant Bat, gain favor with Yavazek in Sun Vale's Animal Town.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Giant Bat, gain favor with Noita the Green in the Fae Realm.

GiantBat.Description: Skill in living and fighting as a bat.
GiantBat.Name: Giant Bat

Goblinese.Description: Fluency in the language of goblins.
Goblinese.Name: Goblinese

Golf.Description: Skill in golf-related games. Covers any game involving the propulsion of an object toward a designated goal on the landscape.
Golf.Name: Golf

Gourmand.Description: The art of appreciating what you eat. Every level of the Gourmand skill increases the duration of meal bonuses by 30 seconds. The main way to earn Gourmand XP is by eating foods you've never eaten before.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Hammer, gain favor with Falkrin Overstrike in Amulna.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Hammer, gain favor with Falkrin Overstrike in Amulna.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Hammer, gain favor with Solgribue in the Fae Realm.

Hammer.Description: Mastery of the use of hammers and clubs in combat. Power consumption is higher than average, but so is damage. Hammers excel at rapidly murdering enemies, no more and no less.

HolisticWellness.Description: An approach to health that involves taking into account factors beyond the obvious. Some critics claim that any benefits are due to the placebo effect, and they may be right. But if it works, who cares?
HolisticWellness.Name: Holistic Wellness

Hoplology.Description:
The study of weapons and armor, with a focus on the benefits and weaknesses of different kinds of equipment.

As the skill increases, Staff users will find that their combat abilities also restore Armor.
Hoplology.Name: Hoplology

Howling.Description: Skill in howling as a werewolf.

IceConjuration.Description: A sub-skill of Ice Magic dedicated to the creation of delicate ice items. These items tend to melt in hot environments.
IceConjuration.Name: Ice Conjuration

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Ice Magic, gain favor with Ichin the Ice Master in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Ice Magic, gain favor with Ichin the Ice Master in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Ice Magic, gain favor with Bendith the Banished in the Fae Realm.

IceMagic.Description: A specialization of Fire Magic that focuses entirely upon lowering temperature instead of raising it. It has protective and controlling abilities as well as offensive abilities.
IceMagic.Name: Ice Magic

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Industry, speak with Sheyna in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Industry, speak with Sheyna in Rahu.

Industry.Description: Competence in completing tasks to specification. Highly industrious workers can juggle more tasks at once, and earn slightly higher rewards for their hard work.
Industry.Name: Industry

IocaineResistance.Description: Practiced resistance to the deadly mushroom poison known as Iocaine. (Each point of this skill reduces the damage from Iocaine-based poisons by 1%.)
IocaineResistance.Name: Iocaine Resistance

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Jewelry Augmentation, gain favor with Kohan or Ufkar in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Jewelry Augmentation, gain favor with Kohan or Ufkar in Rahu.

JewelryAugmentBrewing.Description: Knowledge of the techniques for creating Necklace Augments and Ring Augments. (Augments for other types of equipment are covered by other skills.)
JewelryAugmentBrewing.Name: Jewelry Augmentation

AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Jewelry Crafting, gain favor with Solgribue in the Fae Realm.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Jewelry Crafting, gain favor with Solgribue in the Fae Realm.

JewelryCrafting.Description: The ability to smith and shape raw materials into aesthetically-pleasing rings and necklaces.
JewelryCrafting.Name: Jewelry Crafting

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Knife, gain favor with Rick Snapley in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Knife, gain favor with Rick Snapley in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Knife, gain favor with Pegast in the Fae Realm.

Knife.Description: Using daggers and thrown knives in combat. Knife combat is extremely damaging, relying on traumatic injuries, poison, and subterfuge.
Knife.Name: Knife Fighting

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Leatherworking, gain favor with Sirine in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Leatherworking, gain favor with Sirine in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Leatherworking, gain favor with Felmer in the Fae Realm.

Leatherworking.Description: Turning leathers into armor and goods.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Meditation, gain favor with Ashk in Rahu.

Meditation.Description:
Skill in centering yourself and creating inner focus. This is especially helpful when using Unarmed combat skill.

To meditate, you must be near a Meditation Pillar. Each meditation also requires a simple focus item, such as a fruit or flower.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Mentalism, gain favor with Rohina in Sun Vale.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Mentalism, gain favor with Rohina in Sun Vale.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Mentalism, gain favor with Raina in the Fae Realm.

Mentalism.Description: The power of mind over matter: psychic powers! This combat skill focuses on recovery and restoration, but it also has multiple damaging abilities.
Mentalism.Name: Mentalism

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Mining, gain favor with Urzab in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Mining, gain favor with Urzab in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.

Mining.Description: Digging metals and ores out of the ground.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Mushroom Farming, gain favor with Hemmit Magmagrip in New Prestonbule.

MushroomFarming.Description: The specialized skill of growing mushrooms in grow-boxes.
MushroomFarming.Name: Mushroom Farming

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Mycology, gain favor with Hemmit Magmagrip in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Mycology, gain favor with Hemmit Magmagrip in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Mycology, gain favor with Backfat in the Fae Realm.

Mycology.Description: Mastery of fungus in all its forms.

Myconic.Description: Knowledge of the secret language of ancient fungus creatures.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Nature Appreciation, gain favor with Crelpin in the Fae Realm.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Nature Appreciation, gain favor with Crelpin in the Fae Realm.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Nature Appreciation, gain favor with Crelpin in the Fae Realm.

NatureAppreciation.Description: The ability to study nature and find inner peace and contentment. Even the most hardened warriors need the ability to appreciate nature.
NatureAppreciation.Name: Nature Appreciation

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Necromancy, gain favor with Daniel Murderdark in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Necromancy, gain favor with Daniel Murderdark in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Necromancy, gain favor with Bendith the Banished in the Fae Realm.

Necromancy.Description: Necromancy is control over the undead, along with other powers that trifle with mortality. To use necromantic abilities, you must be wielding or wearing a necromancy gem. You can often find these on weapons, and less often on pieces of armor. (If you are in a beast form, necromancy gems in weapons won't work, but ones in armor will.) You must NOT be wearing a symbol of Arisetsu, as it will negate your powers.

Notoriety.Description: A measure of your renown. You earn Notoriety the first time you defeat certain enemies (typically any monster with a proper name), and for completing particularly difficult quests.

Oratory.Description: The ability to speak in public in a way that moves your audience.
Oratory.Name: Oratory

Orcish.Description: Fluency in Orcish, the ancient language of orcs -- as well as many other races and cultures.
Orcish.Name: Orcish

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Pathology, gain favor with Ashk in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Pathology, gain favor with Ashk in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Pathology, gain favor with Noita the Green in the Fae Realm.

Pathology.Description: Skill in figuring out how someone or something died. Higher skill allows more details to be determined and more difficult organisms to be examined.
Pathology.Name: Pathology

Performance.Description: This umbrella skill represents your ability to entertain with performances of music, acrobatics, dance, art, recitals, and so on.
Performance.Name: Performance

AdvancementHints.10: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.15: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.20: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.25: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.30: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.35: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.40: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.45: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.55: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.
AdvancementHints.65: To earn more XP in Interpretive Dance, learn a new dance move.

Performance_Dance.Description:
Skill in dancing to music in a way that entertains or moves others.

Once you reach level 10 in this skill you'll have all the basics. At that point you can learn hidden dance moves, which will increase your level cap.
Performance_Dance.Name: Interpretive Dance

AdvancementHints.10: To earn more XP in Percussion Instruments, find and equip a mini-dulcimer.
AdvancementHints.20: To earn more XP in Percussion Instruments, find and equip a set of fairy chimes.

Performance_Percussion.Description: Skill in performing with percussion instruments such as drums, bells, and dulcimers.
Performance_Percussion.Name: Percussion Instruments

AdvancementHints.10: To earn more XP in Stringed Instruments, find and equip a harp.

Performance_Strings.Description: Skill in performing with stringed instruments such as harps, lutes, and guitars.
Performance_Strings.Name: Stringed Instruments

AdvancementHints.10: To earn more XP in Wind Instruments, find and equip a blatterhorn.

Performance_Wind.Description: Skill in performing with brass and woodwind instruments such as trumpets, ocarinas, and flutes.
Performance_Wind.Name: Wind Instruments

Phrenology.Description: An understanding of how sentient creatures think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. This base skill represents your overall Phrenological prowess. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

Phrenology_Aberrations.Description: An understanding of how sentient aberrations think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Aberrations.Name: Aberration Phrenology

Phrenology_Crones.Description: An understanding of how crones think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Crones.Name: Crone-Kin Phrenology

Phrenology_Demons.Description: An understanding of how demons think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Demons.Name: Demon Phrenology

Phrenology_Dwarves.Description: An understanding of how dwarves think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Dwarves.Name: Dwarf Phrenology

Phrenology_Elves.Description: An understanding of how elves think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Elves.Name: Elf Phrenology

Phrenology_Fae.Description: An understanding of how fairies think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Fae.Name: Fae Phrenology

Phrenology_Giants.Description: An understanding of how giants think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Giants.Name: Giant Phrenology

Phrenology_Goblins.Description: An understanding of how goblins think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Goblins.Name: Goblin Phrenology

Phrenology_Humans.Description: An understanding of how humans think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Humans.Name: Human Phrenology

Phrenology_Orcs.Description: An understanding of how orcs think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Orcs.Name: Orc Phrenology

Phrenology_Rakshasa.Description: An understanding of how rakshasa think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)
Phrenology_Rakshasa.Name: Rakshasa Phrenology

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Pig, gain favor with Norbert in Sun Vale's "Animal Town".
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Pig, gain favor with Norbert in Sun Vale's "Animal Town".
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Pig, gain favor with Backfat in the Fae Realm.

Pig.Description: The art of living and fighting as a pig.

PoetryAppreciation.Description: Skill in finding the meaning of poems, especially difficult and tedious ones.
PoetryAppreciation.Name: Poetry Appreciation

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Priest, gain favor with Aralorn in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Priest, gain favor with Aralorn in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Priest, gain favor with Raina in the Fae Realm.

Priest.Description:
Officially the 'Priest of Arisetsu' skill, this represents your attunement with Arisetsu, the goddess of Warmth and Hope. When fighting alongside allies, you can bring hope to even the most impossible battles... but you cannot do it alone.

You must be wearing a holy symbol -- and NOT wearing a Necromancy Gem -- to use Priest abilities. Holy symbols are most often found as jewelry, but can also be found on armor and weapons.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Psychology, gain favor with Nissim in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Psychology, gain favor with Nissim in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Psychology, gain favor with Raina in the Fae Realm.

Psychology.Description: Understanding the mind of sentient creatures. Also, using that knowledge in combat and other stressful situations.
Psychology.Name: Psychology

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Rabbit, gain favor with Cinnamon in Sun Vale's "Animal Town".
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Rabbit, gain favor with Cinnamon in Sun Vale's "Animal Town".
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Rabbit, gain favor with Noita the Green in the Fae Realm.

Rabbit.Description: The art of living and fighting as a rabbit or hare. Note: rabbits are not known for their ferocity, so sentient rabbits should carefully consider their choice of secondary skill.

Race_Fae.Description: Skill in things that only fairies can do.
Race_Fae.Name: Fae (Race Skill)

RetailManagement.Description: Skill in managing a shop, boutique, or restaurant.
RetailManagement.Name: Retail Management

Safecracking.Description: Expertise in opening safes, vaults, and other physical barriers.
Safecracking.Name: Safecracking

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Shamanic Infusion, speak with Bogaku in the Rahu Sewers.

ShamanicInfusion.Description: Knowledge and skill in the magical art of enhancing items with the spirit of deceased animals.
ShamanicInfusion.Name: Shamanic Infusion

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Shield, gain favor with Sir Johnson in Amulna.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Shield, gain favor with Sir Johnson in Amulna.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Shield, gain favor with Pegast in the Fae Realm.

Shield.Description: Expertise in the use of a shield, both as a weapon and as a defensive tool.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Sigil Scripting, gain favor with Kohan in Rahu.

SigilScripting.Description: Using magical inks and arcane rituals to create areas of power.
SigilScripting.Name: Sigil Scripting

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Skinning, gain favor with Nishika or Rugen in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Skinning, gain favor with Nishika or Rugen in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Skinning, gain favor with Felmer in the Fae Realm.

Skinning.Description: Skill in the act of removing fur or skin from an animal. You need to be carrying a Skinning Knife in order to skin a corpse. Corpses of sentient creatures, such as goblins and humans, can't be skinned.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Spider, gain favor with Legs in Sun Vale's "Animal Town."
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Spider, gain favor with Legs in Sun Vale's "Animal Town."
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Spider, gain favor with Noita the Green in the Fae Realm.

Spider.Description: The art of living and fighting as a spider.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Spirit Fox, gain favor with Mittens in Kur.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Spirit Fox, gain favor with Mittens in Kur.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Spirit Fox, gain favor with Noita the Green in the Fae Realm.

SpiritFox.Description: Mastery of the techniques of the spirit fox: an awakened fox with supernatural powers.
SpiritFox.Name: Spirit Fox

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Staff, gain favor with Roshun The Traitor outside of Serbule.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Staff, gain favor with Roshun The Traitor outside of Serbule.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Staff, gain favor with Pegast in the Fae Realm.

Staff.Description: Mastery of the staff as a martial weapon. Staff fighting has a mix of both offensive and defensive abilities.

Stoneworking.Description: The use of stone in construction and decoration.
Stoneworking.Name: Stone Working

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Surveying, gain favor with Urzab in Amulna
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Surveying, gain favor with Urzab in Amulna

Surveying.Description: Analyzing the land to locate valuable resources or important locations. Surveying has many uses, but is most commonly used to make resource maps for Geology and Mining.
Surveying.Name: Surveying

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Survival Instincts, gain favor with Sanja in Kur Mountains.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Survival Instincts, gain favor with Sanja in Kur Mountains.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Survival Instincts, gain favor with Backfat in the Fae Realm.

SurvivalInstincts.Description: The ability of self-aware animals to enhance their natural instincts into finely-honed combat techniques. Only animals can use this skill.
SurvivalInstincts.Name: Survival Instincts

SushiPreparation.Description: A sub-skill of Cooking used in the creation of delicious fish meals.
SushiPreparation.Name: Sushi Preparation

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Sword, gain favor with Janet Lews in Kur Mountains.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Sword, gain favor with Janet Lews in Kur Mountains.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Sword, gain favor with Pegast in the Fae Realm.

Sword.Description: Expertise with swords, rapiers, and the like. Swords are very damaging, and can reduce an opponent's Rage.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Tailoring, gain favor with Shirogin in Rahu, or with Elaina in Sun Vale's "Animal Town."
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Tailoring, gain favor with Shirogin in Rahu, or with Elaina in Sun Vale's "Animal Town."
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Tailoring, gain favor with Felmer in the Fae Realm.

Tailoring.Description: Tailoring has two aspects: first, you use it to turn textiles into clothing. Second, you can use tailoring to make clothing and leather armor more comfortable, more useful, or more stylish.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Tanning, gain favor with Sirine in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Tanning, gain favor with Sirine in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Tanning, gain favor with Felmer in the Fae Realm.

Tanning.Description: The craft of turning disgusting animal skins, furs, and hides into leather, fleece, and other material ready to be used in clothing and armor.

Teleportation.Description: The magical art of suddenly being somewhere else.

Textiles.Description: The craft of turning raw ingredients into cloth. Textile creation includes cotton, wool, silk, and many other fiber types. Cloth made from animal hides (e.g. leather) comes from the Tanning skill instead.
Textiles.Name: Textile Creation

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Toolcrafting, gain favor with Amutasa in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Toolcrafting, gain favor with Amutasa in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Toolcrafting, gain favor with Felmer in the Fae Realm.

Toolcrafting.Description: Skill in the creation of advanced tools and unusual equipment. Far more than just creating hand tools, an expert Toolcrafter is a master of repurposing found materials, and can create belts, armors, and even weapons from unusual materials. This equipment is usually designed to meet very specialized needs.
Toolcrafting.Name: Toolcrafting

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Transmutation, speak with Sona in Gazluk.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Transmutation, speak with Sona in Gazluk.

Transmutation.Description: The science of permanently altering how a magical item works. Also covers manipulation of the basic materials of magic, such as phlogiston.
Transmutation.Name: Transmutation

TreasureCartography.Description: Experience creating maps from old clues. The maps can lead to treasure... or tragedy.
TreasureCartography.Name: Treasure Cartography

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Unarmed, gain favor with Furlak in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Unarmed, gain favor with Furlak in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Unarmed, gain favor with Pegast in the Fae Realm.

Unarmed.Description: Mastery of the martial arts. Not especially damaging, but with great controlling and stunning abilities. Generally requires one or both hands to be empty, although you can use kicks even with other items wielded.

Vocabulary.Description: Knowledge of many words in the common language.
Vocabulary.Name: Vocabulary

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Warden, gain favor with Barnaby in the Sacred Grotto.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Warden, gain favor with Barnaby in the Sacred Grotto.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Warden, gain favor with Backfat in the Fae Realm.

Warden.Description: Skill in using the secret powers of the Wardens.
Warden.Name: Warden

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Weapon Augmentation, gain favor with Kohan or Ufkar in Rahu.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Weapon Augmentation, gain favor with Kohan or Ufkar in Rahu.

WeaponAugmentBrewing.Description: Knowledge of the techniques for creating Weapon Augments, Off-Hand Augments, and Glove Augments. (Augments for other types of equipment are covered by other skills.)
WeaponAugmentBrewing.Name: Weapon Augmentation

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Lycanthropy, seek out the Altar of Norala during a full moon, or Sanja in Kur Mountains.
AdvancementHints.60: To earn more XP in Lycanthropy, seek out the Altar of Norala during a full moon, or Sanja in Kur Mountains.
AdvancementHints.70: To earn more XP in Lycanthropy, gain favor with Noita the Green in the Fae Realm.

Werewolf.Description: Skill in fighting as a wolf beast. Also indicates your ability to control and suppress the beast mode.
Werewolf.Name: Lycanthropy

WerewolfMetabolism.Description: Represents your metabolic efficiency when consuming the corpses of fallen foes. When you eat a corpse, you receive a buff that recovers Health, Armor, and Power every few seconds. The duration of the buff is based on your Beast Metabolism skill. The potency of the buff is based on the corpse you've eaten (higher-level monsters are better!), and potency can be further augmented through buffs and treasure.
WerewolfMetabolism.Name: Beast Metabolism
